title: Guys I actually reel good at legend league
body:
my teams just trollz me and is gg then :(((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((( 
I deserve to be in opal tier

replies.body:
This is what every bronze Summoner says. Because, I swear I hear this all the time from bronze and silvers.

Yeah I know I'm silver I'm shit. But, I personally think I deserve Silver I or gold V. But I didn't listen in my earlier years of League and went straight into ranked when I could and went 2-8 so I got bronze 3.

Now that I've listened more to professionals and instead of watching them for how awesome they are I focus more on **how** skilled they are. As I watch their tactical plays positioning and builds, I'm now Silver V so now I've slowly gotten better and will slowly reach my goal over the seasons. Mainly its because I, **don't blame my team for every mistake** that is made and I take responsibility for my mistakes. (Although yes it is your team mates that do cause some Don't flame at them for it just give them some helpful advise)(this video was also helpful https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ugXC7g3p0JU )

> [{quoted}](name=mutley,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Mth2yVQM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-21T06:26:10.589+0000)

> This is what every bronze Summoner says. Because, I swear I hear this all the time from bronze and silvers.

> Now that I've listened more to professionals and instead of watching them for how awesome they are I focus more on **how** skilled they are. As I watch their tactical plays positioning and builds, I'm now Silver V so now I've slowly gotten better and will slowly reach my goal over the seasons. Mainly its because I, **don't blame my team for every mistake** that is made and I take responsibility for my mistakes. (Although yes it is your team mates that do cause some Don't flame at them for it just give them some helpful advise)(this video was also helpful https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ugXC7g3p0JU )

Nah man is my teams fault for every single thing ever, I am supreme player who deserb to be in the global elite rank, I just sick of my teams never passing the ball to me, how am I supposed to score tonnes of goals without the soccer ball ://///////////////////////
You have really got the wrong mind set there mate.

Nah mang is everyones elses not me they troll me and all knife me in gun game, I mean what try hards is that I keep getting set back gun levels :/ also my team feeds like a homeless shelter feeds homeless people mostly becaue me and my team work at a homeless shelter.
I think we are both talking about totally different games here.
